thread.title: SYLVANIA Automotive Lighting Helps Illuminate the Way for NASCAR Hauler Drivers
thread.title_full: SYLVANIA Automotive Lighting Helps Illuminate the Way for NASCAR Hauler Drivers - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: SYLVANIA Automotive Lighting Helps Illuminate the Way for NASCAR Hauler Drivers
text:
OSRAM SYLVANIA
- Sixth Annual 'Hauler Headlights for Safer Nights' Initiative Equips Hauler Drivers for Safer Journeys at Night
LOUDON, N.H. , Sept. 25, While NASCAR ® fans come from around the country to fill the stands and experience the excitement of cheering on their favorite drivers as they race to Victory Lane, it is the hauler drivers that help make this day a reality. Carrying 3,400 pound machines on cross country treks, hauler drivers spend an above average time on the road at dusk or after dark and log upwards of 70,000 miles according to media reports. With 20 different states in the NASCAR Sprint ® Cup Series, navigating a hauler from track to track in less than ideal conditions can be challenging.
North American lighting leader OSRAM SYLVANIA recognizes the magnitude of transporting such valuable cargo and the important role of visibility on hauler's trips in the dark. Through SYLVANIA Automotive Lighting's 'Hauler Headlights for Safe Nights' initiative, NASCAR haulers are upgraded with SYLVANIA SilverStar ® ULTRA headlights, which offer brighter downroad visibility with a whiter light for more clarity, in the SYLVANIA headlight family.
The sixth annual 'Hauler Headlights for Safer Nights' initiative kicked off in July at New Hampshire Motor Speedway (NHMS) during the first of two races at the venue and came full circle on Thursday, September 24 when the haulers made their debut into the infield for the weekend of the SYLVANIA 300 race.
"Hauler drivers can make road trips for nearly a 10 or 15 hour stretch and enhanced visibility is key for transporting over 80,000 pounds of cargo through the night," said Brian Noble , marketing manager, SYLVANIA Automotive Lighting. "It's the hauler drivers that help make races like the SYLVANIA 300 a reality, and we love that we're able to help upgrade the visibility and the safety of their journeys from track to track."
SYLVANIA SilverStar ULTRA headlights provide increased down and side road visibility when compared with SYLVANIA BASIC headlights. Upgrading to whiter, brighter headlights can help increase a driver's ability to react to distractions or hazards on the road. For more information from SYLVANIA Automotive Lighting on improving driving visibility, follow SYLVANIA Automotive on Facebook and visit www.sylvania.com/auto .
Last year, SYLVANIA Automotive Lighting debuted " The Light Shift™ ," a new digital video series that chronicles unique stories of people whose jobs, hobbies or lifelong passions require them to travel to and from their destinations in the dark, and highlights the role that visibility plays in their day to day lives. The first video in the series offered an in-depth look at the journey of a hauler driver, showing a behind the scenes look at hauling a multi-million dollar machine around the country. Watch the hauler's story here and visit www.youtube.com/SYLVANIAlight to see other videos in our Light Shift series.
OSRAM is a registered trademark of OSRAM GmbH.
SYLVANIA and SilverStar are registered trademarks of OSRAM SYLVANIA Inc.
The Light Shift is a trademark of OSRAM SYLVANIA Inc.
All other trademarks are those of their respective owners.
About OSRAM SYLVANIA Automotive Lighting
OSRAM SYLVANIA, together with OSRAM GmbH, is the world leader in automotive lighting for original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and the automotive aftermarket. The company's global automotive lighting division has its principal North American operations in Hillsboro, N.H. , with nearly 600 employees. In addition to TS 16949, this facility has also achieved ISO 9001 and 14001 certifications. Automotive Lighting designs, develops, manufactures and markets state-of-the-art automotive light sources, including auxiliary, advanced halogen, LED and high-intensity discharge lighting for interior, exterior and forward lighting applications. More than 400 lamp types are produced for cars, trucks, and electronics in facilities throughout the U.S., Europe , and Asia . Automotive applications for OEMs are marketed under the OSRAM brand, while products for the aftermarket are sold under the SYLVANIA brand.
About OSRAM SYLVANIA Inc.
OSRAM SYLVANIA is part of OSRAM Americas, a group of OSRAM companies located in North and South America. As a leader in lighting solutions and services, specializing in innovative design and energy saving technology, the company sells products for homes, businesses and vehicles under the brand names OSRAM, Traxon, ENCELIUM and SYLVANIA. The company's portfolio covers the entire value chain of components, ranging from lamps, control units and optical semiconductors such as light-emitting diodes (LED) to luminaires, light management systems and lighting solutions. The OSRAM SYLVANIA and OSRAM Americas regional headquarters is located in Danvers, Massachusetts. For more information, visit www.osram-americas.com or follow us on Facebook and Twitter .
